channel.title: Gnarlyscape PK Source
channel.description:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________ [center][size=7]Npc bug FIXED![/size] [i]I have been informed that npcs never die? Well i have found out why i was searching through the npcHandler and i come to there is nothing handling there death! And i was like wow how did this happen? So i made up a all new method for it and now the [b]NPCS DIE![/b] so if you have already downloaded the source download it again for that bug fixed![/i][/center] __________________________________________________________________________________________________
__________________________________________________________________________________________________ [center][size=7][b]Gnarlyscape Pk Source[/b][/size][/center] __________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][b]Anti-Leech[/b] [i]if this source is released on [b]ANY[/b] other site besides Runelocus or Runefantasy was leeched this is the only site i have and will release on. Report to me if you see on any other site![/i]
[b]Intro[/b] [i]This is my FIRST server i ever made and it's based off pimpscape. All specials work ( Dbow To ). All pots work. And great pking The shops sell everything you need for pking and there are lots of ::commands I hope you like. Comment if you download! All the new Jagex items work, i just was not on silabs client when i made these pictures becasue i deleted the silab cache form my computer and diden't feel like re downloading it so type ::gnarlyarmor, ::gnarlyrange, ::gnarlyhunter for the new items. Working ip ban![/i][/center] _________________________________________________
[center][b]Virus Scan[/b] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2lleznn.jpg[/img] [i]If you don't trust me scan yourself, But remember i will NEVER put anything harmful in my files![/i][/center] _________________________________________________
[center][b]Download[/b] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/123917965/Gnarlyscape_Pk_Source.rar.html][img]http://rapidshare.com/img/bannersmall2.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From RapidShare. (294 KB)[/i]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EJTU219V][img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2v3jz2t.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From Megaupload. (294 KB)[/i][/center] _________________________________________________
[center][b]Few Pictures[/b] [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/30dl82q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/t9ta3l.jpg[/img] [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2w1sh92.jpg[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2nktmx5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2cfax36.jpg[/img] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2wcfhj4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2n7jqkm.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits - [/b][i]98% Gnarly, 2% Jorsa For Pimpscape Base.[/i][/center]
